LanguageData.Alligator.label: alligator
LanguageData.Alligator.description: A large semi-aquatic reptile with a powerful bite. Alligators are slow on land, but deadly in the water.
LanguageData.Alligator.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alligator.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alligator.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.label: alpha thrumbo
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.description: A gigantic, graceful creature of unknown origin. Alpha thrumbos are even rarer and more dangerous than the typical thrumbo. Their hide is nearly impossible to pierce and their razor-sharp horn is worth more than its weight in gold.\n\nAlpha thrumbos are some of the longest-lived moving creatures in the known universe. Some tribes believe they remember and psychically pass on everything they ever experience to their young, so each one has a memory going back thousands of years.
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.tools.left_foot.label: left foot
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.tools.right_foot.label: right foot
LanguageData.AlphaThrumbo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Armadillo.label: armadillo
LanguageData.Armadillo.description: A small mammal with leathery armor all over its body. It is surprisingly quick for a creature with such stubby legs.
LanguageData.Armadillo.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Armadillo.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Armadillo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Badger.label: badger
LanguageData.Badger.description: A stocky omnivorous mammal. Badgers are surprisingly tough for their size.
LanguageData.Badger.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Badger.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Badger.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.BogHound.label: bog hound
LanguageData.BogHound.description: Descended from domesticated dogs, these canines have grown unaccustomed to human company. They're skilled scavengers, able to survive in extremely toxic environments. Bog hounds are harder to tame than their domesticated cousins, and much more dangerous.
LanguageData.BogHound.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.BogHound.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.BogHound.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Bullfrog.label: bullfrog
LanguageData.Bullfrog.description: A large frog known for its loud croak. Bullfrog legs are a delicacy on some planets.
LanguageData.Bullfrog.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Cat_Scimitar.label: scimitar cat
LanguageData.Cat_Scimitar.description: A bioengineered predator that resembles its long-extinct namesake. Originally bred to populate iceworld hunting reserves, these animals are now common pets among glitterworld socialites. Their ferocity should not be underestimated.
LanguageData.Cat_Scimitar.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Cat_Scimitar.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Cat_Scimitar.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.ColossusToad.label: colossus toad
LanguageData.ColossusToad.description: A massive frog bioengineered for industrial farms. While safe to eat, its thick skin secretes an unpleasant slime.
LanguageData.ColossusToad.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Gorilla.label: gorilla
LanguageData.Gorilla.description: A massive and intelligent great ape. While generally peaceful, gorillas are terrifying when enraged.
LanguageData.Gorilla.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.Gorilla.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.Gorilla.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Hippo.label: hippo
LanguageData.Hippo.description: An enormous semi-aquatic mammal with short stocky legs. While it is a herbivore, it can attack with devastating force if provoked. Its powerful jaw can crush bone and armor.
LanguageData.Hippo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.LavaSnail.label: lava snail
LanguageData.LavaSnail.description: A large slow-moving mollusk. Originating from the volcanic planet Nuchadus, lava snails were bred as farm animals. Their skin secretes a thick slime that protects them from extreme temperatures.
LanguageData.LavaSnail.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Mastodon.label: mastodon
LanguageData.Mastodon.description: A massive elephant-like mammal. While briefly extinct, the mastodon now roams countless worlds due to its resilience to bitter cold. Its thick hide makes excellent cold-weather clothing. However, hunting the animal is a dangerous proposition even for skilled hunters.
LanguageData.Mastodon.tools.tusk.label: tusk
LanguageData.Mastodon.tools.left_foot.label: left foot
LanguageData.Mastodon.tools.right_foot.label: right foot
LanguageData.Mastodon.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Megavole.label: megavole
LanguageData.Megavole.description: A massive burrowing rodent, bred for its size and strength. It's almost completely blind but can be surprisingly aggressive when cornered. On some low-tech worlds, these creatures are trained to dig for valuable minerals.
LanguageData.Megavole.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Megavole.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Megavole.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Mink.label: mink
LanguageData.Mink.description: A small semi-aquatic mammal. The high value of its fur has resulted in mink being farmed on numerous planets.
LanguageData.Mink.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Mink.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Mink.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.MonitorLizard.label: monitor lizard
LanguageData.MonitorLizard.description: A large venomous lizard. They secrete toxins from venom glands in their lower jaw to neutralize their prey.
LanguageData.MonitorLizard.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.MonitorLizard.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.MonitorLizard.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Moose.label: moose
LanguageData.Moose.description: One of the largest members of the deer family, adapted to extremely cold climates. Its long legs allow it to travel easily through deep snow.
LanguageData.Moose.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Moose.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Moose.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Muskox.label: muskox
LanguageData.Muskox.description: A shaggy hoofed mammal found in colder climates. Muskox wool is known for being scratchy, but offers good protection against the cold.
LanguageData.Muskox.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Muskox.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Muskox.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Panda.label: panda
LanguageData.Panda.description: A slow lumbering herbivore. Pandas are admired by many for their clumsy charm, making them common pets on urbworlds. On the rim, pandas are rarely seen outside of captivity.
LanguageData.Panda.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Panda.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Panda.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Porcupine.label: porcupine
LanguageData.Porcupine.description: A large rodent. While slow moving, it has a cloak of sharp quills which protect it from predators.
LanguageData.Porcupine.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Porcupine.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Porcupine.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.PrairieDog.label: prairie dog
LanguageData.PrairieDog.description: A burrowing rodent with a short tail and sharp claws used for digging. They are social animals, often living in large colonies.
LanguageData.PrairieDog.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.PrairieDog.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.PrairieDog.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Tiger.label: tiger
LanguageData.Tiger.description: A solitary and dangerous apex predator. Tigers make quick work of their prey, using a mix of stealth and razor-sharp claws.
LanguageData.Tiger.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Tiger.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Tiger.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Wolf_Great.label: greatwolf
LanguageData.Wolf_Great.description: A genetically engineered canine modeled on long-extinct dire wolves. These fearsome predators were created as pets for the glitterworld elite. Wild greatwolves now populate many planets, due to their tendency to escape confinement.
LanguageData.Wolf_Great.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Great.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Great.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Wolverine.label: wolverine
LanguageData.Wolverine.description: A small but ferocious predator. Wolverines are solitary animals that prefer to eat carrion but can kill animals many times their size if needed.
LanguageData.Wolverine.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Wolverine.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Wolverine.tools.head.label: head
